title: The DGT will force the copilots to pass also the breathalyzer test
text: A new measure proposed by the Directorate General of Traffic (DGT) will also oblige the pilots and companions of the drivers to blow in the test of breathalyzer.

According to the DGT it is good that even if the pilot did not drink inside the vehicle another person free of alcohol in case during the trip the driver could feel indisposed. For drivers traveling alone will not be taken into account this, but those who are accompanied must pass the test of sobriety so that at least one of the companions can count as alternative driver. "We believe that it is the safest way to drive, no one knows if the driver can pass something during the journey and it is good that there is always a co-pilot available" explains Alberto Berm√∫dez, director of communication of the DGT.
The new measure will be launched from next July 1 in order that this summer we can have safer roads in our country.
